charaepi_ch0248_00_yarrow/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] came across Milo
taking it easy with his Eldegoss.
charaepi_ch0248_00_yarrow/2301_1201_0200:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Come take a
look at this!
charaepi_ch0248_00_yarrow/2301_1201_0300:
Ever since we arrived on Pasio, Eldegoss’s cotton
has been looking more beautiful than ever!
charaepi_ch0248_00_yarrow/2301_1201_0400:
I guess coming here from Galar’s been a good
change of environment for him.
charaepi_ch0248_00_yarrow/2301_1201_0500: Speaking of which, in case you didn’t know...
charaepi_ch0248_00_yarrow/2301_1201_0600:
Thread made from Eldegoss cotton is a
Galar specialty!
charaepi_ch0248_00_yarrow/2301_1201_0700:
That’s why Eldegoss is such a familiar Pokémon to
the people of Galar.
charaepi_ch0248_00_yarrow/2301_1201_0800:
I’ve been with my Eldegoss a long time now,
and he’s always helping me out!
charaepi_ch0248_00_yarrow/2301_1201_0900:
He doesn’t just battle with me at my Gym.
He also helps me farm!
charaepi_ch0248_00_yarrow/2301_1201_1000:
I hope Eldegoss and I can do some farming
together here on Pasio, too.
charaepi_ch0248_00_yarrow/2301_1201_1100:
The soil on Pasio seems fertile, so I’m sure it’s
worth cultivating!
charaepi_ch0248_00_yarrow/2301_1201_1200:
It’s odd, actually. No matter where I go on
Pasio, the soil’s always ideal.
charaepi_ch0248_00_yarrow/2301_0301_1300:
Maybe because it’s an artificial
island?
charaepi_ch0248_00_yarrow/2301_0401_1400:
Wait, really? You mean this island wasn’t formed
naturally?!
charaepi_ch0248_00_yarrow/2301_0302_1500:
They brought soil here from all sorts
of places.
charaepi_ch0248_00_yarrow/2301_0402_1600: What? You mean this island was made?!
charaepi_ch0248_00_yarrow/2301_1201_1800:
I couldn’t tell! The land and foliage look
so natural!
charaepi_ch0248_00_yarrow/2301_1201_1900: They must’ve had a soil specialist!
charaepi_ch0248_00_yarrow/2301_1201_2000:
I’d love to meet them. But I guess that might be
tough, huh.
charaepi_ch0248_00_yarrow/2301_1201_2100:
Just as Eldegoss spreads the nutritious seeds
attached to its cotton fluff on the wind so that
plants and other Pokémon can benefit from them...
charaepi_ch0248_00_yarrow/2301_1201_2200:
I’ll bet that specialist is traveling all over the
world, enriching the land wherever they go.
charaepi_ch0248_00_yarrow/2301_1201_2400:
It’s a big, wide world here on Pasio.
So from now on, let’s make the most of it!
